item.description:
Program Management in Life Sciences: Part 2

When: February 16, 2012, 6:00 PM - 9:00 PM Where: Route 128 (Location TBD) Register: http://www.westorg.org/2012-02-02--16-program-management-in-life-sciences-part-1--2 Cost: Members: $75; Non-Members: $105; Special Offer: Combined membership and registration: $145. This package rate is for both, renewing WEST members and non-members. Members only package - for Part 1 and Part 2: $125 if you sign up for both programs, a $25 savings. Please join us for this exciting and participatory two-part workshop led by: Emily Walsh, Ph. D., Principal Consultant at Halloran Consulting Group, Inc.

and

Marie Keaveney, Ph. D., Experienced Program Manager

Learn the techniques and tools effective program managers use to:

• Align and organize teams

• Track projects

• Provide senior management visibility on project progress

Learn the tools from simple time-lines to responsibility matrices to strategies for financial planning. You will learn key techniques and ways to best implement them in order to ensure success for your project and pipeline.

Refreshments will be provided
item.name: Program Management in Life Sciences: Part 2
